text: Well written and good story, and I found it a real treat and very entertaining.

Filme mais ou menos, o roteiro é fraco, as cenas são mais ou menos, a história é fraca, o elenco é fraco, e ninguém ajuda a melhorar o filme, os personagens são fracos, e o filme deveria ter cenas bem melhores e relevantes, para fazer o filme ser bom, e as cenas de ação salvaram o filme, e teve vezes que o clone do will smith, nem parecia ser o clone dele, várias vezes mostrava o real ator real do filme que tentavam fazer ser parecido com o will smith.

A perfect example of the fact that critics have no idea what movie audiences like! 27% at the time of writing. Crazy. 

Perfectly well made entertainment with a good cast. No more ridiculous storylines than James Bond.

I am increasingly finding that critic reccomended movies are... 🤔...  crap and often abandoned half way through.

Note to critics... Movies are NOT ART. It is a couple of hours of entertainment.

It was not as bad as others say. I was really only here to see Will Smith smack his wife's name out of his own mouth, and I was not disappointed. sure, they could have investigated more of the concerns behind cloning humans to be lethal weapons and they definitely missed a sequel setup opportunity that would have been as easy as having another clone watch the happily every after ending from afar. still good tho. action was decent. dialogue a bit dry. character arcs were nothing impressive, but the archetypes still fun and personable. i'd give it  3-4/5

Gemini Man punya konsep yang menarik banget — bayangin harus bertarung melawan versi muda dirimu sendiri. Will Smith keren sih mainin dua karakter sekaligus, tapi yang bikin mikir itu konfliknya... soal identitas, masa lalu, dan pilihan hidup. Meskipun CGI-nya belum sempurna, film ini tetap layak buat dinikmati.

Actors are efficient parts are acceptable but story is unrealistic and not well maintained. Seams too much to handle. 

Can't pass 40min watch...
Gemini Man could have been a more interesting film.
Will Smiths days of glory are over..Just fade away!

A bit weak overall. Similar themes in other movies, fine better. No emotional engagement or impact. It seems wooden and by numbers. One good chase scene. Otherwise bland and will smith plays it like he is exhausted. Not really worth your time unless you've nothing better to do, in which case, it's not the worst thing to watch.
One of the worst movies i have ever seen, made me loose whatever respect i had left for will Smith.
Nice film which exhibits science and action and shows human behavior

If you told me that the talkie scenes were all shot without the person(s) being spoken not present, I'd believe you.

The action scenes make you feel like your playing a Playstation game. Press X to dodge.
Press L1 to autoaim and headshot baddie on the roof.

All this aside, its not a terrible film.
It is a good movie, it has a great script, good acting... Everything you need for a good movie. However, some scenes looked like they were ai. They just looked very weird.

Its not a bad Movie and definitely overrated but sometimes the cgi was pretty bad and some lines or conversations felt kind of awkward, but besides that , there was some great action and some really exciting scenes and fights , id say it is worth a watch especially because will smith did a great performance.
Okay
What a waste of 30 minutes. Narrative is shallow and strong nonsense boomer energy feels through out. Nothing really drawing in. There are better movies for sure
Who keeps hiring this guy??

Alright, maybe not a great film. Certainly not a “must watch.” But Will Smith is always fun to watch, and I liked Mary Winstead’s performance as well. While I wouldn’t recommend “Gemini Man” to someone, I also don’t disapprove of it.
Will Smith did a great job
Boring, forgettable, and really stale, but enjoyable enough if you're just in it for the action sequences.
